description: Main entry point for a Flutter mobile application, defining the app structure with a MaterialApp and a simple home page widget.

classes.name: MyApp
classes.description: Root widget of the application that sets up MaterialApp with theme and home page.

classes.name: MyHomePage
classes.description: Stateful widget representing the main screen with a title.

classes.name: _MyHomePageState
classes.description: State class managing the UI of MyHomePage, displaying a progress indicator.

methods.name: main
methods.description: The application's entry point, which runs the MyApp widget.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Build method of MyApp creating MaterialApp, and of _MyHomePageState creating Scaffold with UI elements.
